name: Axe of Three
description:
UTD SGDA Spring 2021 Game Jam submission

Switch between the three modes of your axe to vanquish your enemies! 

How to Play: Press E to switch between modes, hold down the spacebar to swing your axe into the ground

Bullets are for ghosts, and spikes are for the green crawlies!

Music by marching dream, Sound Effects by Dustyroom

Feedback is much appreciated!!
